sound.description: The ID of the sound event to play.
sound.markdownDescription: The ID of the sound event to play.

category.description: If specified, this specifies the category and options the sound event falls under. Otherwise, uses the category specified in the entity that invoked this action. Accepts `"master"`, `"music"`, `"record"`, `"weather"`, `"block"`, `"hostile"`, `"neutral"`, `"player"`, `"ambient"` or `"voice"`.
category.markdownDescription: If specified, this specifies the category and options the sound event falls under. Otherwise, uses the category specified in the entity that invoked this action. Accepts `"master"`, `"music"`, `"record"`, `"weather"`, `"block"`, `"hostile"`, `"neutral"`, `"player"`, `"ambient"` or `"voice"`.

volume.description: The volume of the sound event.
volume.markdownDescription: The volume of the sound event.

pitch.description: The pitch of the sound event.
pitch.markdownDescription: The pitch of the sound event.

type.description:
## Play Sound --- [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/play_sound) Plays a sound event at the entity's position. Type ID: `origins:play_sound` --- ### üìù Note The value of the `volume` field is used to multiply the base distance of the sound event, which is 16 blocks (`1.0`). --- ### Examples ```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:play_sound", "sound": "minecraft:entity.chicken.egg" } ``` This example will play the `minecraft:entity.chicken.egg` sound event that can be heard within a 16 blocks distance. (`16 * 1.0 = 16`)
```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:play_sound", "sound": "minecraft:entity.enderman.death", "volume": 1.5 } ``` This example will play the `minecraft:entity.enderman.death` sound event that can be heard within a 24 blocks distance. (`16 * 1.5 = 24`)
type.markdownDescription:
undefined## Play Sound --- [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/play_sound) Plays a sound event at the entity's position. Type ID: `origins:play_sound` --- ### üìù Note The value of the `volume` field is used to multiply the base distance of the sound event, which is 16 blocks (`1.0`). --- ### Examples ```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:play_sound", "sound": "minecraft:entity.chicken.egg" } ``` This example will play the `minecraft:entity.chicken.egg` sound event that can be heard within a 16 blocks distance. (`16 * 1.0 = 16`)
```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:play_sound", "sound": "minecraft:entity.enderman.death", "volume": 1.5 } ``` This example will play the `minecraft:entity.enderman.death` sound event that can be heard within a 24 blocks distance. (`16 * 1.5 = 24`)
